name: Uair
tagline: U-Air is a private web cloud.
body:
# Description
U-Air allow you to browse upload and download your files, wherever you are.
You forget take any file from home to your friend? Now its not problem.
You can easly browse your files, upload new and listen MP3 songs.

# Screenshots
![screen 1](https://myapps.developer.ubuntu.com/site_media/appmedia/2013/08/uair.png)
![screen 2](https://myapps.developer.ubuntu.com/site_media/appmedia/2013/08/uair6_1.png)

# Download and run:
* git clone --recursive https://github.com/michal0468/uair
* cd uair
* python launcher.py
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
